name: ExplanationOfBenefit
title: ExplanationOfBenefit
description: This resource provides: the claim details; adjudication details from the processing of a Claim; and optionally account balance information, for informing the subscriber of the benefits provided.

elements.name: ExplanationOfBenefit
elements.description: This resource provides: the claim details; adjudication details from the processing of a Claim; and optionally account balance information.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: A unique identifier assigned to this explanation of benefit.

elements.name: status
elements.description: The status of the resource instance.

elements.name: type
elements.description: The category of claim, e.g. oral, pharmacy, vision, institutional, professional.

elements.name: subType
elements.description: A finer grained suite of claim type codes which may convey additional information such as Inpatient vs Outpatient and/or a specialty service.

elements.name: use
elements.description: A code to indicate whether the nature of the request is: to request adjudication of products and services previously rendered; or requesting authorization and adjudication for provision in the future; or requesting the non-binding adjudication of the listed products and services which could be provided in the future.

elements.name: patient
elements.description: The party to whom the professional services and/or products have been supplied or are being considered and for whom actual for forecast reimbursement is sought.

elements.name: billablePeriod
elements.description: The period for which charges are being submitted.

elements.name: created
elements.description: The date this resource was created.

elements.name: enterer
elements.description: Individual who created the claim, predetermination or preauthorization.

elements.name: insurer
elements.description: The party responsible for authorization, adjudication and reimbursement.

elements.name: provider
elements.description: The provider which is responsible for the claim, predetermination or preauthorization.

elements.name: priority
elements.description: The provider-required urgency of processing the request.

elements.name: fundsReserveRequested
elements.description: A code to indicate whether and for whom funds are to be reserved for future claims.

elements.name: fundsReserve
elements.description: A code, used only on a response to a preauthorization, to indicate whether the benefits payable have been reserved and for whom.

elements.name: related
elements.description: Other claims which are related to this claim such as prior submissions or claims for related services or for the same event.

elements.name: prescription
elements.description: Prescription to support the dispensing of pharmacy, device or vision products.

elements.name: originalPrescription
elements.description: Original prescription which has been superseded by this prescription to support the dispensing of pharmacy services, medications or products.

elements.name: payee
elements.description: The party to be reimbursed for cost of the products and services according to the terms of the policy.

elements.name: referral
elements.description: A reference to a referral resource.

elements.name: facility
elements.description: Facility where the services were provided.

elements.name: claim
elements.description: The business identifier for the instance of the adjudication request: claim predetermination or preauthorization.

elements.name: claimResponse
elements.description: The business identifier for the instance of the adjudication response: claim, predetermination or preauthorization response.

elements.name: outcome
elements.description: The outcome of the claim, predetermination, or preauthorization processing.

elements.name: disposition
elements.description: A human readable description of the status of the adjudication.

elements.name: preAuthRef
elements.description: Reference from the Insurer which is used in later communications which refers to this adjudication.

elements.name: preAuthRefPeriod
elements.description: The timeframe during which the supplied preauthorization reference may be quoted on claims to obtain the adjudication as provided.

elements.name: careTeam
elements.description: The members of the team who provided the products and services.

elements.name: supportingInfo
elements.description: Additional information codes regarding exceptions, special considerations, the condition, situation, prior or concurrent issues.

elements.name: diagnosis
elements.description: Information about diagnoses relevant to the claim items.

elements.name: procedure
elements.description: Procedures performed on the patient relevant to the billing items with the claim.

elements.name: precedence
elements.description: This indicates the relative order of a series of EOBs related to different coverages for the same suite of services.

elements.name: insurance
elements.description: Financial instruments for reimbursement for the health care products and services specified on the claim.

elements.name: accident
elements.description: Details of a accident which resulted in injuries which required the products and services listed in the claim.

elements.name: item
elements.description: A claim line. Either a simple (a product or service) or a 'group' of details which can also be a simple items or groups of sub-details.

elements.name: addItem
elements.description: The first-tier service adjudications for payor added product or service lines.

elements.name: adjudication
elements.description: The adjudication results which are presented at the header level rather than at the line-item or add-item levels.

elements.name: total
elements.description: Categorized monetary totals for the adjudication.

elements.name: payment
elements.description: Payment details for the adjudication of the claim.

elements.name: formCode
elements.description: A code for the form to be used for printing the content.

elements.name: form
elements.description: The actual form, by reference or inclusion, for printing the content or an EOB.

elements.name: processNote
elements.description: A note that describes or explains adjudication results in a human readable form.

elements.name: benefitPeriod
elements.description: The term of the benefits documented in this response.

elements.name: benefitBalance
elements.description: Balance by Benefit Category.
